description:
runtime: show frame pointer values during throw

Should help if stack overflows start happening again.

Fixes issue 3582.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to

runtime: show frame pointer values during throw

Should help if stack overflows start happening again.

Fixes issue 3582.
